original_text: When Jesus had finished telling these stories, he went away from that place.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 모든 비유를 마치신 후에 그 곳을 떠나서

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had finished telling these stories
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 이 비유들을 다 말씀하셨을 때

sentences.original_text: he went away from that place
